description: When two hot boys party their asses off on the town, sometimes the next morning is rough!  Friends Andy Robindale and Andrew Markus have just awoken to find themselves at the county jail, locked up for getting too wild.  But the party's not about to end!Andrew can't help but worry they're both in deep trouble, but Andy's a bit more relaxed.  He knows the best thing they can do now is make the most of a difficult situation.  That means a little fooling around in their jail cell!  Once Andrew loosens up enough to take Andy's fat cock down his throat, the boys start to realize life on the inside might not be so bad.  After some nice, deep sucking, Andy gets his lips around Andrew's large, bulging erection for a taste.  Things heat up even more when Andrew climbs on top of his pal to go for a ride.  Watch Andy's thick meat pound Andrew's bad-boy hole as these gorgeous Twinks find the best way to pass time behind bars.Enjoy!
title: Cellmates
